intro: Persoonia muelleri subsp. densifolia, commonly known as the dense-leaved geebung, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Proteaceae and is characterized by its dense, leathery foliage. The plant produces small, white or cream-colored flowers that are clustered in cylindrical inflorescences. It typically grows in sandy or rocky soils in coastal and heathland environments. Persoonia muelleri subsp. densifolia is valued for its ornamental appeal and ecological role in native ecosystems.
